entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
